Sest. <pb n="693" /> <cb n="EXPE" /> 13, 30: <cit><quote lang="la">naves ab litore in altum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:41:3:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 41, 3, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">me domo mea expulistis, Pompeium domum suam compulistis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,027:7:16" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Pis. 7, 16</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">aliquos agris,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:4:4:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 4, 4, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">humiliores possessionibus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 6, 22, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">hostes finibus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 4, 3</bibl></cit> <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">finibus expulsus patriis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:1:620" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 1, 620</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">me civitate,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:10:4:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Att. 10, 4, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">aliquem regno,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,002:3:110:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. C. 3, 110, 5</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">potestate expulsi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0588,001:3:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Nep.</author> Milt. 3, 5</bibl></cit> et saep.: <cit><quote lang="la">nostri majores et Collatinum expulerunt, et reliquos Tarquinios,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,043:2:31" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Rep. 2, 31</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">expulso Tarquinio (shortly after, pulso Tarquinio),</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 2, 30</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">me in pace patriā meā expulit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:35:19:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 35, 19, 4</bibl></cit>; so, <cit><quote lang="la">aliquam patriā,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0588,001:Thras. 1:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Nep.</author> Thras. 1, 5</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0588,001:Epam. 6:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Epam. 6, 3</bibl>; cf. <cit><quote lang="la">also: in exsilium expulsus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,052:12:42" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Lael. 12, 42</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Hannibalem in exsilium (Carthago),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:38:50:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 38, 50, 7</bibl></cit>: expulsa atque exturbata filia, <hi rend="ital">rejected</hi>, <hi rend="ital">repudiated</hi> (as a wife), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,010:5:14" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Clu. 5, 14</bibl>; so, <cit><quote lang="la">uxorem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:9:5" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> 9, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">edicit suis, postero die porta Esquilina expellerent pecus,</quote> <trans><tr>drive out</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:2:11:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 2, 11, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sagittam arcu,</quote> <trans><tr>to let fly</tr>, <tr>shoot</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:3:381" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 3, 381</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">expulsuri tela nervos retro tendimus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:10:3:6" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 10, 3, 6</bibl></cit>: se in auras (pondus), <hi rend="ital">forced itself out.</hi> i. e. <hi rend="ital">came forth</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:9:705" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 9, 705</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad componendum Orientis statum expulsus,</quote> <trans><tr>forced to hurry away</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=cal.:1" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Calig. 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">naturam expellas furca, tamen usque recurret,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 1, 10, 24</bibl></cit>.</sense><sense id="n17004.2" n="II" level="1"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg>, <hi rend="ital">to force out</hi>, <hi rend="ital">drive out</hi> or <hi rend="ital">away</hi>, <hi rend="ital">expel</hi>, <hi rend="ital">remove</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">aliquem vita,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,014:16:34" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Mur. 16, 34</bibl></cit>; cf. <cit><quote lang="la">aevo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:3:358" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 3, 358</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">me periculo,</quote> <trans><tr>delivered myself</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,004:4:9:41" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Bacch. 4, 9, 41</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">haec (superbiam, luxum, desidias, etc.) ex animo dictis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:5:50" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 5, 50</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">laetitias ex omni pectore,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0472,001:76:22" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cat.</author> 76, 22</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">corde desidiam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,019:3:2:24" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Trin. 3, 2, 24</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">curas pectore,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:3:53" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 3, 53</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">per vulnera mille Sontem animam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:6:617" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 6, 617</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">vitam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:16:19" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 16, 19</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">morbum bilemque helleboro meraco,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 2, 2, 137</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">somnos (haec dicta),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,002:14:72" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> H. 14, 72</bibl></cit>; cf. <cit><quote lang="la">quietem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:8:830" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> M. 8, 830</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quae res omnem dubitationem adventus legionum expulit,</quote> <trans><tr>removed</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:5:48" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 5, 48 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">beneficiorum memoriam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,002:1:34:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> B. C. 1, 34, 3</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:6:8:16" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 6, 8, 16</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">spem metus expulerat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,007:6:245" default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> F. 6, 245</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sententia expulsa,</quote> <trans><tr>rejected</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:8:14" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 8, 14 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: dedititios per constitutionem, <hi rend="ital">to abolish</hi> as a class, i. e. <hi rend="ital">to remove the legal disabilities of</hi>, Just, <bibl default="NO"><author>Inst.</author> 1, 5, 3</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
